name: Native Animals: The Red Squirrel
description:
"Native Animals", the well-known documentary, discusses the winter-preparation of the red squirrel. In this game, you control a squirrel and learn about its life and behaviour. Build a drey, collect food and prepare for the winter.

This game was made during and for the Great Harvest Game Jam.

Controls

WSAD or Arrow Keys - move and climb
SPACE - jump
F or Right CTRL - interact with your environment
ESC - quit to main menu

If you want to mute the ambient sounds, press M in-game.
If you want to mute the sounds, press N in-game.

Technical Details

The game was made in Java with the libGDX Framework ( https://libgdx.badlogicgames.com/). We made all the graphics ourselves, using PyxelEdit (https://pyxeledit.com/) and Tiled ( https://www.mapeditor.org) for the map. All the sound effects were created with assets of the ‘The #GameAudioGDC Bundle’ (http://www.sonniss.com/).

Made by

Graphics, Level Design & Sound: Skosnowich

Programming: Matjes
